name: Altkom Software & Consulting
description:
We have been developing dedicated software for over 20 years and together with our Clients we achieve successes.
We provide application development services and IT consulting supporting our clients in their business growth. We design, develop, implement and maintain software for companies from various industries and cultural environments.
Our clients are based in, i.e. Poland, France, Belgium, United Kingdom, Czech Republic, USA, Germany, Switzerland, Italy.
We are the team of more than 200 developers, engineers, architects, analysts, project managers, scrum master
We delivered more than 100 large software and consulting projects
We have competences in over 55 technologies
We aim in long-term relationship and cooperation
„See different – achieve more” - our approach to work with clients reflects superior values that guide us in business: Efficiency and Safety.
